splash.heading: Are you suffering from damage or your insurance company?
splash.description: GuardianClaims is a public adjusting firm that works with your insurance company to get you a fair settlement and make you whole again. We're only compensated when you get the settlement you deserve and are ready to handle all residential, business, and commercial property insurance loss claims.
splash.footerText: Insurance companies are well-represented, and you should be too!

claimSteps.description: When life throws you storm, water, fire, or smoke damage, we help your family or business restore life and income to the way it was.

boxes.title: Free Claim Review
boxes.description: Every claim is unique- tell us a little more about your situation, and we'll develop a plan to get you the settlement you deserve.

boxes.title: Connect with Us
boxes.description: Communication and education are key parts of our process, and licensed public adjusters will provide personal service from the free claim review through the entire settlement process.

boxes.title: Receive Your Settlement
boxes.description: We negotiate with your insurance company so you don't have to! Once we reach a fair settlement, you'll receive payment and the peace of mind that comes with it.

claimTypes.description: GuardianClaims adjusters are experienced in all facets of residential and commercial insurance losses.

residentialSplash.heading: Claims take time. Or, you can hire us.
residentialSplash.paragraph: When disaster strikes, we get you the settlement you deserve so you can get back to the things that matter most.

residentialSecondary.heading: Residential Claims
residentialSecondary.paragraph: It's frustrating to read your policy and deal with insurance companies. Their business model is designed to confuse and minimize the claims they pay. That's where GuardainClaims comes in: Our public adjusters negotiate all claims for fire, water, storm, and other damages. We focus on personal service to you and your family, making you whole again.

contentOne.heading: It Starts With Your Free Claim Review
contentOne.paragraphOne: GuardianClaims licensed public adjusters will reach out to begin building your case.
contentOne.paragraphTwo: We will review your policy and documents to confirm coverage for your damages. Experienced adjusters and experts will inspect your property and prepare a visual report supporting a fair settlement for you and your family.

contentTwo.heading: We Handle Insurance Companies, So You Don't Have To
contentTwo.paragraphOne: Homeowners often find negotiations frustrating– the process can drag on for months or years if mishandled. Most policyholders make the mistake of trusting their insurance company's assessment and find themselves short of restoring their loss and income.
contentTwo.paragraphTwo: GuardianClaims adjusters negotiate with your insurance companies to reach a fair settlement that will make you whole again.

contentThree.heading: Settlement
contentThree.paragraphOne: The moment you have been waiting for has now arrived! Once a fair settlement has been reached, GuardianClaims processes the funding of your settlement to ensure accurate and prompt payment according to the terms. And remember, we don't get paid unless you do!
contentThree.paragraphTwo: However, allowing GuardianClaims to guide you through our systematic claim process guarantees a fair and accurate settlement based upon the coverage provided in your policy, and the damages sustained to your property.

commercialSplash.heading: Business as usual. Until it's not.
commercialSplash.paragraph: People rely on you, and you rely on your insurance company. We expedite a fair settlement so you can get back to business.

commercialSecondary.heading: Commercial Claims
commercialSecondary.paragraph: Your business suffered a loss, and the distraction is taking you away from what you do best- running your business and making money. The only thing that can make matters worse is dealing with your insurance company! Your time is valuable, so put GuardianClaims commercial public adjusters to work to settle your business claim and make you whole again.

contentOne.heading: Our Commercial Property Process
contentOne.paragraphOne: Your business loss generated a lot of paperwork on top of all the headaches. GuardianClaims commercial public adjusters take over the process and pay attention to the details that streamline claims. Our commercial process starts with a thorough policy review to confirm coverage and build a case. Our comprehensive document review, property inspection, and visual report ensure that your insurance company has no choice but a fair settlement.

contentTwo.heading: Submission & Negotiation - Your Clearscope Report
contentTwo.paragraphOne: Insurance companies are well-represented, and GuardianClaims' commercial division will ensure you are, too! Once your documents, inspections, and photo loss report are compiled, a GuardianClaims Clearscope report is prepared to account for all damages and entitlements. Our comprehensive Clearscope report captures evident and underlying damages so nothing is overlooked and ensures your restoration plan is thorough. We include measures to mitigate further losses, which are often overlooked and a necessary step on your part. GuardianClaims Clearscope report serves as a settlement roadmap for your business's restoration and recovery and focuses your insurance company on a fair resolution of your claim.

contentThree.heading: Settlement
contentThree.paragraphOne: The settlement phase is the most eagerly anticipated part of the process, but here again, insurance companies may try to settle hastily, undermining the extent of your damages. GuardianClaims protects your best interests with attention to detail, ensuring a fair and accurate settlement.
contentThree.paragraphTwo: Last but not least, GuardianClaims processes the funding of your settlement to ensure accurate and prompt payment according to the terms of your policy. And remember, we don't get paid unless you do!

contractorSplash.heading: Relationships Matter
contractorSplash.paragraph: Contractors and associations are some of our closest friends. And friends don't let friends negotiate with insurance companies.

contractorSecondary.heading: Contractors & Associations
contractorSecondary.paragraph: Contractors and property associations can rely on GuardianClaims to negotiate fair settlements for their clients and insureds. Your insurance policies and claims are complex and require attention to detail that only GuardianClaims can provide. Let us fight for you and take one more thing off your plate. Then, let's grab lunch.

contentOne.heading: Contractors
contentOne.paragraphOne: You are experts at restoration and renovation- with a deep understanding of construction, material costs, labor, and project timelines. At GuardianClaims, we are experts in dealing with insurance companies- with a deep understanding of policies, negotiating strategies, and fair settlements. Together, we create a synergy with the client's best interest at heart, making them whole again.

contentTwo.heading: HOA, COA, & POA
contentTwo.paragraphOne: GuardianClaims ensures homeowner associations, condo associations, and property owner associations are well-represented, just like the insurance companies. You encounter unique hurdles when handling insurance claims- from navigating complex policies to understanding the rights of unit owners, and the claims process can be daunting.
contentTwo.paragraphTwo: Often, oversights or errors are made by those trying their best, resulting in undervalued claims, extended settlement durations, and issues with neighbors. GuardianClaims specializes in handling it all for you- providing clarity and direction to ensure your community gets the swift and fair settlement it deserves.

contentThree.heading: Affiliations
contentThree.paragraphOne: GuardianClaims uses iink payment processing to manage all settlements, eliminating delays and streamlining your payments. Our commitment to a seamless, secure, and efficient payment ensures your payment is hassle-free and timely, leading to a quicker restoration process.
contentThree.paragraphTwo: GuardianClaims is excited to join United Claims Professionals (UCP), the newest organization for public adjusters and industry experts. Our affiliation with UCP signifies our dedication to upholding the highest standards of professionalism. The relationship bolsters our ability to provide top-notch services and demonstrate our commitment to you, the insured.

whoWeAre.heading: Who We Are
whoWeAre._comment (internal use only): The paragraphs below are completely dynamic, this means that you add or remove any of the paragraphs and the page will handle it automatically.
paragraphs: GuardianClaims is a family-owned and operated business serving the communities of North Carolina and South Carolina. Our founders grew up in the contracting, roofing, and public adjusting space, spending over a decade witnessing what damage and disappointment do to families and businesses.

Insurance companies always have the best negotiators and take advantage of every situation to minimize the claims they pay. So, who advocates for families and businesses? We learned about public adjusters and their role in processing and settling claims for the insured, and our mission became clear. GuardianClaims was founded to help families and businesses stand up to insurance companies and spread the word about public adjusters.

GuardianClaims staff understand and navigate the complex claims process, so you don't have to. We ensure our clients receive the compensation they deserve with transparency and communication- hallmarks of our firm. We work closely with clients to understand their unique circumstances, provide the personal attention they deserve, and ensure a fair and accurate settlement.

Thank you for trusting GuardianClaims with your residential and commercial insurance claims. We look forward to meeting you, advocating for you, and getting you the settlement you deserve so life can return to the way it was.
